text:
apparently, the new place is http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/net/ or rather
http://www.apache.org/dist/jakarta/commons/net/binaries
although even then, I still got
<<BUILD FAILED
file:c:/data/MyProj/ant_test.xml:15Could not create task or type of type: telnet.>>
creator: hauser@acm.org
bodewig@apache.org
text:
The version found at jakarta and the "old" NetComponents are not the same, the
package names are different for example.

Ant 1.5.3 requires the "old" version and thus the links are correct.  Ant's CVS
HEAD and with it Ant 1.6 will require the Jakarta version and the links have
already been adapted.

Choose between INVALID and FIXED ;-)

if I can choose, definitely FIXED - in other places statistics with INVALID's
were held against me!

Anyway, thx for the hint - I finally saw that in that zip, there is also the
.jar file and it works.
creator: hauser@acm.org
